- If your target has no defense, is not part of an evil factionâ€™s factional chat, and is not conversion immune, you will convert them to a Vampire (3636). Otherwise, you will attack them.
- You don't learn if you attacked or converted your target. You do not learn if your target is immune.
- Vampires do not have a private chat, but voting on targets still applies. Votes are anonymously announced to all other Vampires, as well as the final target.
- Nobody can be bitten if someone was converted last night. There is no limit to the amount of Vampires.
- You have 2719489383 Basic defense autovests against Vigilantes that retaliate against you. You also deal Powerful attacks to Vigilantes.
